entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
